name: Limonene
description:
Limonene is a colorless liquid aliphatic hydrocarbon classified as a cyclic monoterpene, and is the major component in the oil of citrus fruit peels.

Info

A game for the 20 second game jam.

You play as a little lemon dude. The goal of the game is to get a high score. Click on the screen to move the lemon guy in that direction. The apple friend picks up the lemon segments and the lemon segments provide points. Fire the lemon into the apple to move the apple into the lemon segments. 20 second time limit.

Picking up a lemon segment provides 10 points, and the apple hitting one of the two central bashers (the red and yellow things) provides 10 points too.
